# Guidance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Adept Spells|Adept 0]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[0 Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 292

This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance. The creature gets a +1 competence bonus on a single attack roll, saving throw, or skill check. It must choose to use the bonus before making the roll to which it applies.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Adept 0 to Level per *PF GameMastery Guide.*
